segments.text: I didn't know you paint . What type of painting is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I enjoy oil painting . I learned it in one of my extra classes in college .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds so interesting . I wish I learned a hobby .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hobbies are never too late to learn . They offer a variety of classes at the local community college . You should look into it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I will . Thanks for the info .
segments.speaker: S1
